name: Mechanized (MagentaDev)
description:
Be the Bullet Hell against the hordes of Hell. Blast apart Hell Rats, Devils, Demons, and Winged Fiends with your mechanized suit's gun turrets, collect soul gems, and use them to upgrade your suit even more.

Controls

  • Touchscreen
  • Mouse (click and hold on the on-screen joy pad)
  • Keyboard (directional keys)

First version created as month 11a of 12

  • Idea

Leave comments or send messages via email, twitter, or discord.
